name: NSXPCCoder
desc: A coder that encodes and decodes objects that your app sends over an XPC connection.

items.name: var connection: NSXPCConnection?
items.desc: The connection currently performing encoding or decoding.

items.name: var userInfo: NSObjectProtocol?
items.desc: An optional user information object associated with the coder.

items.name: func encodeXPCObject(xpc_object_t, forKey: String)
items.desc: Encodes an object to send over an XPC connection.

items.name: func decodeXPCObject(ofType: xpc_type_t, forKey: String) -> xpc_object_t?
items.desc: Decodes an object and validates that its type matches the type a service provides over XPC.
